org.everit.osgi.ecm.annotation

Annotation Type BundleCapabilityRef


  • @Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
public @interface BundleCapabilityRef
    The annotation identifies a Bundle Capability reference. The reference will be satisfied if the bundle capability is provided by a bundle that has the necessary stateMask().

    The annotation can be defined on variables, setter methods or within the BundleCapabilityRefs annotation on top of the class.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String namespace
      Namespace of the bundle capability.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String attributeId
      The id of the attribute of the reference.
      float attributePriority
      The priority of the attribute.
      ReferenceConfigurationType configurationType
      Type of configuration that is either a clause or a filter.
      String[] defaultValue
      The default value(s) of the attribute.
      String description
      A descriptive text to provide the client in a form to configure this property.
      boolean dynamic
      If true, the reference is re-binded without restarting the component in case of a service switch.
      String label
      The label to display in a form to configure this attribute.
      boolean metatype
      Boolean flag defining whether the attribute should be listed in the MetatypeProvider or not.
      ThreeStateBoolean multiple
      Multiplicity.
      boolean optional
      Whether at least one reference should be configured or not.
      String referenceId
      The id of the reference.
      String setter
      The setter method that should be used to set the reference.
      int stateMask
      State mask of the bundle that can provide the necessary capability.

    • Element Detail

      • namespace

        public abstract String namespace
        Namespace of the bundle capability.

      • attributeId

        public abstract String attributeId
        The id of the attribute of the reference. If not provided the default value is defined based on the value of configurationType():
        • ReferenceConfigurationType.FILTER: The default value will be " referenceId()" + ".target".
        • ReferenceConfigurationType.CLAUSE: The default value will be " referenceId()" + ".clause".
        Default:
        ""

      • attributePriority

        public abstract float attributePriority
        The priority of the attribute. Smaller number means higher priority. The attributes with higher priority will be rendered first on the configuration screen.
        Default:
        1000.0f

      • configurationType

        public abstract ReferenceConfigurationType configurationType
        Type of configuration that is either a clause or a filter.
        Default:
        org.everit.osgi.ecm.annotation.ReferenceConfigurationType.FILTER

      • defaultValue

        public abstract String[] defaultValue
        The default value(s) of the attribute. In case the annotation is appended to a field or method, the default values come from the default value of the field. In case the reference is not optional, the component does not need configuration and the default value is not defined, a one element array will be used with an empty String.
        Default:
        {}

      • description

        public abstract String description
        A descriptive text to provide the client in a form to configure this property. This name may be localized by prepending a % sign to the name. Default value: %<name>.description
        Default:
        ""

      • dynamic

        public abstract boolean dynamic
        If true, the reference is re-binded without restarting the component in case of a service switch. The component also does not stop if the configuration is updated behind in the way that the reference can remain satisfied after the actualization of the clause(s) or filter(s).
        Default:
        false

      • label

        public abstract String label
        The label to display in a form to configure this attribute. This name may be localized by prepending a % sign to the name. Default value: %<name>.name
        Default:
        ""

      • metatype

        public abstract boolean metatype
        Boolean flag defining whether the attribute should be listed in the MetatypeProvider or not.
        Default:
        true

      • multiple

        public abstract ThreeStateBoolean multiple
        Multiplicity. See the documentation of ThreeStateBoolean.
        Default:
        org.everit.osgi.ecm.annotation.ThreeStateBoolean.DEFAULT

      • optional

        public abstract boolean optional
        Whether at least one reference should be configured or not.
        Default:
        false

      • referenceId

        public abstract String referenceId
        The id of the reference. If not specified and the annotation is defined on a field, the id of the reference will be the name of the field.
        Default:
        ""

      • setter

        public abstract String setter
        The setter method that should be used to set the reference. If the annotation is defined on a method, that method and it is not specified otherwise in the annotation, the method will be used as a bind method. If the annotation is attached to a field and the bind method is not defined in the annotation and there is method that has the same name as the field but prefixed with "bind" that method will be used as a bind method. In case there is no bind method but there is a setter for the field, it will be used to set the property.
        Default:
        ""

      • stateMask

        public abstract int stateMask
        State mask of the bundle that can provide the necessary capability.
        Default:
        32
